DOC.brief_summary: Patients are subjected to simultaneous intracranial and lumbar puncture pressure measurements. This study focus on intracranial pulse amplitude. Hypothesis: Intracranial pressure amplitude is reflected by lumbar puncture pressure amplitude.
DOC.brief_title: Intracranial Pressure Waves Via Lumbar Puncture
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of Idiopathic Normal Pressure Hydrocephalus Known cause of hydrocephalus
